bioconda.name: mummer
bioconda.summary: MUMmer is a system for rapidly aligning entire genomes

biocontainers.name: mummer
biocontainers.summary: Mummer is a modular system for the rapid whole genome alignment of finished or draft sequence. basically it is a ultra-fast alignment of large-scale dna and protein sequences

biotools.summary: MUMmer is a modular system for the rapid whole genome alignment of finished or draft sequence. Basically it is a ultra-fast alignment of large-scale DNA and protein sequences

bioschemas.name: MUMmer
bioschemas.summary: MUMmer is a modular system for the rapid whole genome alignment of finished or draft sequence. Basically it is a ultra-fast alignment of large-scale DNA and protein sequences
